subject: AI & Agents
title: Role Prompting: Give the Model a Persona
description: One-minute skill: Role Prompting: Give the Model a Persona.

hook.text: Ask a model to review code and it's generic. Say 'you are a senior Go dev'â€”it sharpens.

buildup.text: Role prompting sets an expertise persona that steers vocabulary and depth.

discovery.text: Roles activate relevant knowledge clusters the model learned during training.

twist.text: Overly specific roles can introduce false confidence and hallucinations.

climax.text: Pair a role with explicit constraints: 'You are X. Only answer about Y.'

punchline.text: A role focuses; constraints keep it honest.

quiz.question: Why does role prompting improve output quality?
